41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin 'Ukaim said:"The Messenger of Allah wrote to Juhainah: 'Do not make use of the skin and sinew of dead animals."' (Hasan) Abu 'Abdur-Rahman )An-Nasa'i) said: The most correct about this topic, regarding the skins of the dead animal when it is tanned, is the narration of Az-Zuhri, from 'Ubaidullah bin 'Abdullah, from Ibn 'Abbas, from Maimunah, and Allah knows best

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُدْبَغُ بِهِ جُلُودُ الْمَيْتَةِ
chapter.eng-name: With What The Skin Of A Dead Animal Is Tanned
